{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aruba Networks |model=AP-104 |revision= |asin=B00QUE4V8M,B00A8AYRPQ, |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_date=04/16/2012 |fcc_id=Q9DAP104 |ic_id=4675A-AP104 |pcb_id=YXG00A-1.6MM |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161;AR7161-BC1A; |cpu1_cspeed=680 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AB160TSA-5G |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, console,, RJ45 |wi1_module=SerComm YQK00B-1.0 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=SerComm YQK00B-1.0 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8021;AR8021-BL1E; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=schematics |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=D8:C7:C8 |oui_eth=D8:C7:C8 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless Access Point}} :[http://www.arubanetworks.com/pdf/products/DS_AP105.pdf Datasheet]
*OEM: [[SerComm]], Main board: YXG00A-1.6MM, Wireless module: YQK00B-1.0 :this appears to be the same wireless module as the [[Aruba Networks AP-105]]
• Schematics show the device with 2x 16Mx16 chips for RAM while the FCC photos :seem to show the device with two ''EtronTech'' EM6AB160TSA-5G chips (32Mx16) • Device probably uses [[Atheros]] AR9220 and AR9223 :PoE: 48V/350mA ([https://fccid.io/Q9DAP104/External-Photos/Ext-1674021 label])
===See also=== :;[[Aruba Networks]] *[[Aruba Networks AP-93]] • [https://www.amazon.com/Aruba-AP-93-Wireless-Controller-Required/dp/B008GTFDDQ B008GTFDDQ] *[[Aruba Networks AP-103]] • [https://www.amazon.com/Networks-AP-103-Wireless-Access-802-11N/dp/B00K95ALSW B00K95ALSW] *[[Aruba Networks AP-104]] • [https://www.amazon.com/Ap-104-Wireless-Network-Controller-Required/dp/B00QUE4V8M B00QUE4V8M] *[[Aruba Networks AP-105]] • [https://www.amazon.com/Aruba-AP-105-802-11n-Wireless-Access/dp/B008VFTNKE B008VFTNKE] *[[Aruba Networks AP-125]] • [https://www.amazon.com/Aruba-Networks-AP-125-802-11a-Controller/dp/B004O3RTWG B004O3RTWG] *[[Aruba Networks AP-205]] • [https://www.amazon.com/Aruba-AP-205-Wireless-Access-802-11ac/dp/B00KF49TBM B00KF49TBM]
